org.jcatapult.dbmgr.service
Interface ModuleJarService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultModuleJarService
public interface ModuleJarService

Service for interacting with ModuleJar object User: jhumphrey Date: Dec 14, 2007

Method Summary
 List<JarEntry> getJarDirectorySQLEntries(ModuleJar moduleJar, String dirPath)
          Returns a list of JarEntry objects within the directory path specified
 LinkedList<ModuleJar> resolveJars(File projectXml, String dependenciesId)
          Resolves jars.
 

Method Detail

resolveJars

LinkedList<ModuleJar> resolveJars(File projectXml,
                                  String dependenciesId)
Resolves jars. The resolution strategy is implementation dependent but will generally resolve via the classpath, file system or some other data store resource.

Parameters:
projectXml - the project.xml file belonging to the project to resolve jars for
dependenciesId - the dependencies id from the project.xml where jars should be resolved from
Returns:
a linked list of module jars

getJarDirectorySQLEntries

List<JarEntry> getJarDirectorySQLEntries(ModuleJar moduleJar,
                                         String dirPath)
Returns a list of JarEntry objects within the directory path specified

Parameters:
moduleJar - the module jar
dirPath - the directory path. the trailing forward slash isn't necessary.
Returns:
list of JarEntry objects contained within the directory
